content: you enjoyed making your little toad clown hat and collar if you have any questions concerning the pattern you can email me at magewood@hotmail com or through @ m a g e woodwhimsies copyright information this pattern was designed and written with a lot of love by me maggie l wood a k a mage wood whimsies please do not distribute this pattern yourself and please do remember to give credit to me as the designer of the pattern when posting or selling your work made with this pattern online as i so look forward to seeing your creations on instagram and other social media you can use pattern by @magewoodwhimsies and/or #magewoodwhimsies so that i can see your work thank you so much for downloading my pattern 7 © maggie l wood
